ayFX_PlayBank
#define ayFX_PlayBank(
id,
prio
) ayFX_PlayBankFC(FC88(prio, id)) u8 ayFX_PlayBankFC(u16 id_prio) __FASTCALL

Play a ayFX sound

Paramaters
id

Sound index in the bank

prio

Priority of the sound (0-15). 0 is the highest priority.  Returns: Error number (if any) @see AYFX_ERROR
